title: User wants to create a new Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - Preliminary or Rejected tx already exisits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - Submitted tx already exisits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" should cause the system to load the existing submitted transaction in view mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to be able to delete Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this ["Transfer of Rehab Assignment"]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: BOC user wants to edit existing Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - Approved or Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes

title: Club user wants to edit existing Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - Preliminary and Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: Club user wants to edit existing Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - not Preliminary or Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files to the transaction
BUT user should not be able to edit any other part of the transaction

title: User wants to cancel existing Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should reload the form in default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save and up to cancellation point reflected
BUT not confirming cancellation should return the user to the form and take no action

title: User wants to save existing Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - Post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND transaction is in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN required field and formatting checks should be run
AND transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save existing Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx - First time saving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND tx has not been saved previously
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display
AND transaction status will be set to Preliminary

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history - Submitted tx exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted "Return from Rehab" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" should cause the system to load the existing submitted transaction in view mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history - Preliminary or Rejected tx exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to be able to delete Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this ["Return from Rehab"]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: BOC User wants to edit existing Return from Rehab tx - Approved or Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes fields
AND user should be able to edit any other part of the transaction not specifically stated as not editable post-approval in the data discovery.

custom_expected:

custom_expected:

title: User wants to cancel existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes made
AND if form has been previously saved confirming cancellation should reload the form in default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save and up to cancellation point reflected
OR if form has not been previously saved form should be closed and no record should be kept and user should be returned to entry point of the transaction
BUT not confirming cancellation should return the user to the form and take no action

AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Rehab Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Rehab Assignment" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget

title: BOC user wants to add additional Extension to Approved Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing a Rehab Assignment tx for a player
AND the tx is in an Approved State
AND the tx has at least one extension added
AND "Add Extension" button is visible beneath latest extension
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Add Extension" button
custom_expected:
THEN an additional Extension section should be added to the form
AND extension section should match data discovery and wireframe
AND user should be able to complete extension section and click "Save" on the tx
AND clicking save should run all on Save rule checks and required field and formatting checks
AND successful save blue notification should display

title: BOC user wants to edit existing Rehab Assignment tx - Approved or Reversed

AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes
BUT user should not be able to edit Assign To, Assignment Date, or Number of days for Rehab  fields

title: BOC user wants to remove an Extension from an Approved Rehab Assignment tx - multiple extensions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx for a player in edit mode
AND tx is in "Approved" state 
AND tx has at least one extension added
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a subsequent Extension
custom_expected:
THEN a trash can becomes available on the new Extension
AND clicking the trash can should remove just the newly added set of Extension fields

title: User wants to delete Rehab  tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this [Place on Rehabilitation Assignment]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: BOC user wants saving Approved Rehab Assignment with an Extension to append "Extended" to player's player history entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has an Approved "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx open in edit mode
AND user has added a new Extension to the tx
AND this Extension is the first Extension being added to the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if an Extension has been added
AND system should add "-EXTENDED" to the Rehabilitation Assignment in the player's Player History 
AND this should only be done for the first extension

title: Receive error if submitting Rehab Assignment for a Restricted player that is not Restricted due to drug violation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit or Approve a Rehab Assignment tx for a player
AND player's current or pending MN Roster Status is "Restricted"
AND "Reason for Placement" is NOT "Violation of Major League Drug Testing Program" or "Violation of  Minor League Drug Testing Program"
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A player may only be placed on rehab from the Restricted List for a drug violation."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction 
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx - preliminary or rejected tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected transaction already exists for the player from within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load existing transaction in edit mode

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx - submitted tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted transaction already exists for the player from within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load existing transaction in view mode

AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the transaction
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted transaction should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: Allow BOC user to edit an existing place on a 60-Day DL Transaction- Approved or Reversed Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 60-Day DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is in an Approved or Reversed (including supressed) status
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to attach new files
AND user should be able to edit existing attachments
AND user should be able to update "Comments" and "BOC Notes"
BUT user should NOT be able to edit anything listed as not editable post approval in the data discovery
AND clicking Save should reload the form in view mode

title: Allow Club user to edit an existing place on a 60-Day DL Transaction- other statuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 60-Day DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is not in Preliminary or Rejected status
custom_expected:
THEN user should only be able to attach new files to the transaction
BUT user should not be able to edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction
AND clicking Save should reload the form in View mode

title: Allow BOC user to see flag for Exam Date Entered more than 10 days ago
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user has submitted a MN Place on 60-Day DL tx
AND Exam Date entered on the tx is more than 10 days ago
AND club user has overridden the error for Exam Date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user views the tx
custom_expected:
THEN flag for "Exam Date entered is more than 10 days ago." should be present on the form
AND clicking on the flags icon should open a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form
AND flag should display on Approvals Item if present
AND flag should be dismissed on Approve or Reject of tx

title: Save a 60 Day DL tx - post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user has a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction open in edit mode
AND transaction is in a "Post-Approval" state
AND a "Save" button is available
custom_expected:
THEN required field and format checks will be made
AND transaction and its current values should be saved
AND system should display a successful save blue notification
AND the transaction should be reloaded in view mode

custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user has a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction open in edit mode
AND this transaction has not previously been saved
AND a "Save" button is available
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved
AND system should display a successful save blue notification
AND the transaction should be reloaded in view mode
AND transaction status should be set to "Preliminary"

custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player

custom_expected:

AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the transaction
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted transaction should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: Cancel creation of or changes to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should close form and keep no record, and return user to point of entry
AND not confirming cancellation should return user to form and take no action

title: Cancel creation of or changes to 60 Day DL tx - previously saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
AND form has been saved by user previously
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should reload form in default mode for the transaction state with none of the edits made since last save reflected
AND not confirming cancellation should return user to form and take no action

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to save place on 7-Day DL tx post-approval without "Submitted Documents to MLB Medical Director" checkbox checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to save a Place on 60-Day DL tx that is in post-approval state
AND "Submitted Documents to MLB Medical Director" checkbox is displayed on the form
BUT "Submitted Documents to MLB Medical Director" checkbox is not checked
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "You must submit documents to MLB Medical Director in order for the player to be placed on the DL for a Concussion."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Receive an error if placement date precedes last game date on tx - doubleheader option checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND entered Placement Date is before (not on) "Last Game Date" 
AND doubleheader option is checked
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player cannot be placed on the DL before his Last Game Appearance of..."
AND clicking Back button should return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error if  player they're attempting to place on 7-Day DL has stats from a game played after the Placement Date - doubleheader exception
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 60-Day DL tx exists for a player
AND selected player has stats on the stats tab for a game played after the placement date on the tx (not on the same date)
AND Doubleheader Exception checkbox is checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places where onSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check for all stats found on stats table
AND system should display message "Stats have been found for player on {game date the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy"}."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Receive an error if exam date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if injury date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Injury Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Injury Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User Selects "Place on 7-Day DL" option- Preliminary or Rejected Place already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C166607]
AND existing Preliminary or Rejected place already exists in a "Place on 7-day DL" transaction for the selected player, created within last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option
custom_expected:
THEN system should open existing Preliminary or Rejected transaction in edit mode
AND transaction should follow the wireframe and data discovery

title: User Selects "Place on 7-Day DL" option- Submitted transaction already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C166607]
AND a Submitted transaction for "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" already exists for the selected player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option
custom_expected: THEN the existing submitted transaction will open in View Mode

title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to save changes to the transaction for later access- Post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user wants to save changes to a player's "Place on 7-Day DL" transaction
AND transaction is in a post-approval state
custom_expected:
THEN required field and format checks will be made to the transaction
AND the transaction will save and reload in view mode
AND system will display a successful save blue notification (Message #77)

title: Allow BOC user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day DL Transaction- Approved or Reversed Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is in an Approved or Reversed (including supressed) status
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to attach new files
AND user should be able to edit existing attachments
AND user should be able to update "Comments" and "BOC Notes", and any other part of the transaction not specifically stated as not editable post-approval in the data discovery
AND clicking Save should reload the form in view mode

title: Allow Club user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day DL Transaction- Preliminary and Rejected Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is in an Preliminary or Rejected status
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form
AND clicking Save should reload the form in View mode

title: Allow Club user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day DL Transaction- other statuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is not in Preliminary or Rejected status
custom_expected:
THEN user should only be able to attach new files to the transaction
AND user should not be able to edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction
AND clicking Save should reload the form in View mode

title: Allow user to delete a Place on 7-Day  DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to delete a Place on 7-Day DL transaction
AND user has edit permissions
AND transaction is in Preliminary or Rejected sate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the grey Delete button in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user with " Are you sure you want to delete this [form]?"
AND clicking yes will delete and close the form and return user to entry point
AND clicking no will return the user to the form and take no action
AND deleted transactions should not appear on the front end or be searchable.

title: Allow user to cancel creation of or changes to a place on 7-day  DL transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the process of creating a Place on 7-Day DL transaction in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks grey Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel changes
AND confirming cancellation will reload the form in the default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save reflected
AND not confirming cancellation will return the user to the form and take no action

title: Error message when user attempts to save DL transaction with invalid date format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Place on 7-Day DL transaction in Submitted or higher state
AND date entered on transaction is in an invalid format (ex: yyyy/m/d)
custom_expected: THEN user should see error message

title: Error message if Exam Date is in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed 7-Day DL transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Injury Date is in the future
custom_preconds:

custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Injury Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to save place on 7-Day DL tx post-approval without "Submitted Documents to MLB Medical Director" checkbox checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to save a Place on 7-Day DL tx that is in post-approval state
AND "Submitted Documents to MLB Medical Director" checkbox is displayed on the form
BUT "Submitted Documents to MLB Medical Director" checkbox is not checked
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "You must submit documents to MLB Medical Director in order for the player to be placed on the DL for a Concussion."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: User wants to receive error if  player they're attempting to place on 7-Day DL has stats from a game played after the Placement Date - doubleheader exception
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL tx exists for a player

custom_expected:
THEN the system should check for all stats found on stats table
AND system should display message "Stats have been found for player on {game date the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy"}."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: User wants to add new Authorized Signatory from a Transfer to 15-Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with edit capabilities for the Authorized Signatory Widget
AND user is viewing a Transfer to 15-Day DL tx in edit mode 
AND authorized signatory field contains a list of the Authorized Signatories with MJ Transactions checked off in the Auth Signatories widget, that belong to the Org displayed on the transaction
AND "New" link appears above the Authorized signatory field
custom_expected:
THEN a modal should be launched that allows user to enter a new Authorized Signatory for the player's Org
AND the checkbox associated with the form the user is adding a new signatory from should be auto checked and disabled.
AND the Save button should be disabled until all required fields have been populated.
AND clicking "Save" should add the authorized signatory to the system and close the modal, with the "Authorized Signatory" field pre-populated with the newly added Authorized Signatory
AND the Authorized SIgnatory should be added to the authorized signatory widget and should appear for the Org for all users that have permission to view that Org's Authorized Signatories
AND clicking Cancel should cancel the addition of the authorized signatory, and return the user to the form
